data_table.description: ECG Serial Change, Exam 2. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: SOURCE
variable.description: Source: ARIC or NOVA [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA3
variable.description: ECG coder - 1st ECG - blank [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA5
variable.description: Q-QS pattern (1xx) I aVL V6 - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]
variable.value: Q/R amplitude ratio more or equal to 1/5 and < 1/3, plus Q duration more or equal to 0.02 sec and < 0.03 sec in lead I or V6
Q duration more or equal to 0.03 sec and < 0.04 sec, plus R amplitude more or equal to 3 mm in lead aVL

variable.name: ESMA6
variable.description: Q-QS pattern (1xx) II III aVF - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]
variable.value: Q/R amplitude ratio more or equal to 1/3, plus Q duration equal to 0.03 sec in lead II
Q/R amplitude ratio more or equal to 1/3, plus Q duration more or equal to 0.02 sec and < 0.03 sec in lead II
Q amplitude more or equal to 5.0 mm in leads III or aVF
Q/R amplitude ratio more or equal to 1/5 and < 1/3, plus Q duration more or equal to 0.02 sec and < 0.03 sec in lead II
Q duration more or equal to 0.03 sec and < 0.04 sec in lead III, plus a Q-wave equal to 1.0 mm amplitude in the majority of beats in lead aVF
QS pattern in each of leads III and aVF. (Do not code in the presence of 7-1-1.)

variable.name: ESMA7
variable.description: Q-QS pattern (1xx) V1-V5 - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]
variable.value: Q/R amplitude ratio more or equal to 1/3 plus Q duration equal to 0.03 sec in any of leads V2, V3, V4, V5
QS pattern in all of leads V1-V4 or V1-V5

Initial R amplitude decreasing to 2.0 mm or less in every beat (and absence of codes 3-2, 7-1-1, 7-2-1, or 7-3) between any of leads V2 and V3, V3 and V4, or V4 and V5. (All beats in the lead immediately to the right on the chest must have an initial R > 2 mm.)

variable.name: ESMA8
variable.description: ST segment depression (4xx) I aVL V6 - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]
variable.value: STJ depression more or equal to 0.5 mm and < 1.0 mm and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in any of leads I, aVL, or V6
STJ depression more or equal to 0.5 mm and < 1.0 mm and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in any of leads I, aVL, or V6
No STJ depression as much as 0.5 mm but ST segment downward sloping and segment or T-wave nadir more or equal to 0.5 mm below P-R baseline, in any of leads I, aVL, or V6

variable.name: ESMA9
variable.description: ST segment depression (4xx) II III aVF - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]
variable.value: STJ depression more or equal to 0.5 mm and < 1.0 mm and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in lead II or aVF
No STJ depression as much as 0.5 mm, but ST segment downward sloping and segment or T-wave nadir more or equal to 0.5 mm below P-R baseline in lead II

variable.name: ESMA10
variable.description: ST segment depression (4xx) V1-V5 - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]
variable.value: STJ depression more or equal to 0.5 mm and < 1.0 mm and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in any of leads V1 - V5
No STJ depression as much as 0.5 mm, but ST segment downward sloping and segment or T-wave nadir more or equal to 0.5 mm below P-R baseline in any of leads V2 - V5

variable.name: ESMA11
variable.description: T wave (5x) I aVL V6 - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]
variable.value: T amplitude negative or diphasic (positive-negative or negative-positive type) with negative phase at least 1.0 mm but not as deep as 5.0 mm in lead I or V6, or in lead aVL when R amplitude is more or equal to 5.0 mm
T amplitude zero (flat), or negative, or diphasic (negative-positive type only) with less than 1.0 mm negative phase in lead I or V6, or in lead aVL when R amplitude is more or equal to 5.0 mm
T amplitude positive and T/R amplitude ratio < 1/20 in any of leads I, aVL, V6; R wave amplitude must be more or equal to 10.0 mm

variable.name: ESMA12
variable.description: T wave (5x) II III aVF - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]
variable.value: T amplitude negative or diphasic with negative phase (negative-positive or positive-negative type) at least 1.0 mm but not as deep as 5.0 mm in lead II, or in lead aVF when QRS is mainly upright
T amplitude zero (flat), or negative, or diphasic (negative-positive type only) with less than 1.0 mm negative phase in lead II; not coded in lead aVF

variable.name: ESMA13
variable.description: T wave (5x) V1-V5 - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]
variable.value: T amplitude negative 5.0 mm or more in any of leads V1-V5
T amplitude negative (flat), or diphasic (negative-positive or positive-negative type) with negative phase at least 1.0 mm but not as deep as 5.0 mm, in any of leads V1-V5
T amplitude zero (flat), or negative, or diphasic (negative-positive type only) with less than 1.0 mm negative phase, in any of leads V3-V5
T amplitude positive and T/R amplitude ratio < 1/20 in any of leads V3-V5; R wave amplitude must be more or equal to 10.0 mm

variable.name: ESMA14
variable.description: ST segment elevation (92x) I aVL V6 - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA15
variable.description: ST segment elevation (92x) II III aVF - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA16
variable.description: ST seg elevation (92x) V1-V5 - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA17
variable.description: R (3x) - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]
variable.value: Left: R amplitude > 26 mm in either V5 or V6, or R amplitude > 20.0 mm in any of leads I, II, III, aVF, or R amplitude > 12.0 mm in lead aVL. (All criteria measured only on second to last complete normal beat.)

Left (optional code when 3-1 is not present): R amplitude > 15.0 mm but " 20.0 mm in lead I, or R amplitude in V5 or V6, plus S amplitude in V1 > 35.0 mm. (Measured only on second to last complete normal beat.)

variable.name: ESMA18
variable.description: A-V conduction defect (6xx) - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]
variable.value: P-R (P-Q) interval more or equal to 0.22 sec in the majority of beats in any of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF

variable.name: ESMA19
variable.description: Ventricular conduction defect (7xx) - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]
variable.value: Missing

Incomplete right bundle branch block. QRS duration < 0.12 sec in each of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF, and R' > R in either of leads V1, V2 .(Code as 3-2 in addition if those criteria are met. 7-3 suppresses code 1-2-8.)

Incomplete right bundle branch block. QRS duration < 0.12 sec in each of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF, and R' > R in either of leads V1, V2 .(Code as 3-2 in addition if those criteria are met. 7-3 suppresses code 1-2-8.)
Intraventricular block. QRS duration more or equal to 0.12 sec in a majority of beats in any of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF. (7-4 suppresses all 2, 3, 4, 5, 9-2, 9-4, 9-5 codes.)
Intraventricular block. QRS duration more or equal to 0.12 sec in a majority of beats in any of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF. (7-4 suppresses all 2, 3, 4, 5, 9-2, 9-4, 9-5 codes.)
R-R' pattern in either of leads V1, V2 with R' amplitude more or equal to R
R-R' pattern in either of leads V1, V2 with R' amplitude more or equal to R

Incomplete left bundle branch block. (Do not code in the presence of any codable Q- or QS-wave.) QRS duration more or equal to 0.10 sec and < 0.12 in the majority of beats of each of leads I, aVL, and V5 or V6

variable.name: ESMA20
variable.description: Misc (9x) 1x - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA21
variable.description: Misc (9x) 3x - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA22
variable.description: Misc (9x) 5x - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]
variable.value: T-wave amplitude > 12 mm in any of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF, V1, V2, V3, V4, V5, V6. (Do not code in the presence of 6-4-1, 7-1-1, 7-2-1 or 7-4.)

variable.name: ESMA23
variable.description: U wave (blank) - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA24
variable.description: Suppression 8 - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA25
variable.description: Technical problem (98x) - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA26
variable.description: Clear - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA27
variable.description: B1: suppression pattern (6xx) - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA28
variable.description: C1: type of suppression (6xx) - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA29
variable.description: D1: bundle branch block - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA30
variable.description: E1: major Q I aVL V6 - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA31
variable.description: F1: minor Q I aVL V6 - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA32
variable.description: G1: major Q II III aVF - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA33
variable.description: H1: minor Q II III aVF - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA34
variable.description: I1: major Q V1-V5 - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA35
variable.description: J1: minor Q V1-V5 - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA40
variable.description: Q-Qs pattern (1xx) I aVL V6 - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]
variable.value: Q/R amplitude ratio more or equal to 1/3, plus Q duration more or equal to 0.03 sec in lead I or V6
Q duration more or equal to 0.04 sec, plus R amplitude more or equal to 3 mm in lead aVL
Q/R amplitude ratio more or equal to 1/3, plus Q duration more or equal to 0.02 sec and < 0.03 sec in lead I or V6
Q duration more or equal to 0.03 sec and < 0.04 sec in lead I or V6
Q/R amplitude ratio more or equal to 1/5 and < 1/3, plus Q duration more or equal to 0.02 sec and < 0.03 sec in lead I or V6
Q duration more or equal to 0.03 sec and < 0.04 sec, plus R amplitude more or equal to 3 mm in lead aVL

variable.name: ESMA41
variable.description: Q-QS pattern (1xx) II III aVF - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]
variable.value: Q/R amplitude ratio more or equal to 1/3, plus Q duration equal to 0.03 sec in lead II
Q duration more or equal to 0.05 sec in lead III, plus a Q-wave amplitude more or equal to 1.0 mm in the majority of beats in lead aVF
Q duration more or equal to 0.05 sec in lead aVF
Q/R amplitude ratio more or equal to 1/3, plus Q duration more or equal to 0.02 sec and < 0.03 sec in lead II
Q duration more or equal to 0.03 sec and < 0.04 sec in lead II
QS pattern in lead II. Do not code in the presence of 7-1-1
Q duration more or equal to 0.04 sec and < 0.05 sec in lead III, plus a Q-wave more or equal to 1.0 mm amplitude in the majority of beats in aVF
Q amplitude more or equal to 5.0 mm in leads III or aVF
Q duration more or equal to 0.03 sec and < 0.04 sec in lead III, plus a Q-wave more or equal to 1.0 mm amplitude in the majority of beats in lead aVF
Q duration more or equal to 0.03 sec and < 0.04 sec in lead aVF
QS pattern in each of leads III and aVF. (Do not code in the presence of 7-1-1.)

variable.name: ESMA42
variable.description: Q-QS pattern (1xx) V1-V5 - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]
variable.value: Q/R amplitude ratio more or equal to 1/3 plus Q duration more or equal to 0.03 sec in any of leads V2-V5
Q duration more or equal to 0.04 sec in any of leads V1-V5
QS pattern when initial R-wave is present in adjacent lead to the right on the chest, in any of leads V2-V6
Q/R amplitude ratio more or equal to 1/3, plus Q duration more or equal to 0.02 sec and < 0.03 sec, in any of leads V2-V5
Q duration more or equal to 0.03 sec and < 0.04 sec in any of leads V2-V5

Initial R amplitude decreasing to 2.0 mm or less in every beat (and absence of codes 3-2, 7-1-1, 7-2-1, or 7-3) between any of leads V2 and V3, V3 and V4, or V4 and V5. (All beats in the lead immediately to the right on the chest must have an initial R > 2 mm.)
Q/R amplitude ratio more or equal to 1/5 and < 1/3 plus Q duration more or equal to 0.02 and < 0.03 sec in any of leads V2-V5
QS pattern in lead V1 and V2. (Do not code in the presence of 3-1 or 7-1-1.)

variable.name: ESMA43
variable.description: ST segment depression (4xx) I aVL V6 - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]
variable.value: STJ depression more or equal to 0.5 mm and < 1.0 mm and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in any of leads I, aVL, or V6
STJ depression more or equal to 0.5 mm and < 1.0 mm and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in any of leads I, aVL, or V6
No STJ depression as much as 0.5 mm but ST segment downward sloping and segment or T-wave nadir equal to 0.5 mm below P-R baseline, in any of leads I, aVL, or V6
No STJ depression as much as 0.5 mm but ST segment downward sloping and segment or T-wave nadir equal to 0.5 mm below P-R baseline, in any of leads I, aVL, or V6
STJ depression more or equal to 1.0 mm but < 2.0 mm, and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in any of leads I, aVL, or V6

variable.name: ESMA44
variable.description: ST segment depression (4xx) II III aVF - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]
variable.value: STJ depression more or equal to 0.5 mm and < 1.0 mm and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in lead II or aVF
No STJ depression as much as 0.5 mm, but ST segment downward sloping and segment or T-wave nadir more or equal to 0.5 mm below P-R baseline in lead II

variable.name: ESMA45
variable.description: ST segment depression (4xx) V1-V5 - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]
variable.value: STJ depression more or equal to 0.5 mm and < 1.0 mm and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in any of leads V1 - V5
STJ depression more or equal to 0.5 mm and < 1.0 mm and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in any of leads V1 - V5
No STJ depression as much as 0.5 mm, but ST segment downward sloping and segment or T-wave nadir more or equal to 0.5 mm below P-R baseline in any of leads V2 - V5
No STJ depression as much as 0.5 mm, but ST segment downward sloping and segment or T-wave nadir more or equal to 0.5 mm below P-R baseline in any of leads V2 - V5
STJ depression more or equal to 1.0 mm and ST segment upward sloping or U-shaped in any of leads V1 - V5
STJ depression more or equal to 1.0 mm and ST segment upward sloping or U-shaped in any of leads V1 - V5
STJ depression more or equal to 2.0 and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in any of leads V1-V5

variable.name: ESMA46
variable.description: T wave (5x) I aVL V6 - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]
variable.value: T amplitude negative or diphasic (positive-negative or negative-positive type) with negative phase at least 1.0 mm but not as deep as 5.0 mm in lead I or V6, or in lead aVL when R amplitude is more or equal to 5.0 mm
T amplitude zero (flat), or negative, or diphasic (negative-positive type only) with less than 1.0 mm negative phase in lead I or V6, or in lead aVL when R amplitude is more or equal to 5.0 mm
T amplitude positive and T/R amplitude ratio < 1/20 in any of leads I, aVL, V6; R wave amplitude must be more or equal to 10.0 mm

variable.name: ESMA47
variable.description: T wave (5x) II III aVF - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]
variable.value: T amplitude negative or diphasic with negative phase (negative-positive or positive-negative type) at least 1.0 mm but not as deep as 5.0 mm in lead II, or in lead aVF when QRS is mainly upright
T amplitude zero (flat), or negative, or diphasic (negative-positive type only) with less than 1.0 mm negative phase in lead II; not coded in lead aVF
T amplitude positive and T/R amplitude ratio < 1/20 in lead II; R wave amplitude must be more or equal to 10.0 mm

variable.name: ESMA48
variable.description: T wave (5x) V1-V5 - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]
variable.value: T amplitude negative or diphasic with negative phase (negative-positive or positive-negative type) at least 1.0 mm but not as deep as 5.0 mm in lead II, or in lead aVF when QRS is mainly upright
T amplitude zero (flat), or negative, or diphasic (negative-positive type only) with less than 1.0 mm negative phase in lead II; not coded in lead aVF
T amplitude positive and T/R amplitude ratio < 1/20 in any of leads V3, V4, V5; R wave amplitude must be more or equal to 10.0 mm

variable.name: ESMA49
variable.description: ST segment elevation (92x) I aVL V6 - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA50
variable.description: ST segment elevation (92x) II III aVF - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA51
variable.description: ST segment elevation (92x) V1-V5 - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]
variable.value: ST segment elevation more or equal to 1.0 mm in lead V5 or ST segment elevation equal to 2.0 mm in any of leads V1-V4

variable.name: ESMA52
variable.description: R (3x) - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]
variable.value: Left: R amplitude > 26 mm in either V5 or V6, or R amplitude > 20.0 mm in any of leads I, II, III, aVF, or R amplitude > 12.0 mm in lead aVL. (All criteria measured only on second to last complete normal beat.)

Left (optional code when 3-1 is not present): R amplitude > 15.0 mm but " 20.0 mm in lead I, or R amplitude in V5 or V6, plus S amplitude in V1 > 35.0 mm. (Measured only on second to last complete normal beat.)

variable.name: ESMA53
variable.description: AV conduction defect (6xx) - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]
variable.value: P-R (P-Q) interval more or equal to 0.22 sec in the majority of beats in any of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF

variable.name: ESMA54
variable.description: Ventricular conduction defect (7xx) - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]
variable.value: Incomplete right bundle branch block. QRS duration < 0.12 sec in each of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF, and R' > R in either of leads V1, V2 .(Code as 3-2 in addition if those criteria are met. 7-3 suppresses code 1-2-8.)
Intraventricular block. QRS duration more or equal to 0.12 sec in a majority of beats in any of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF. (7-4 suppresses all 2, 3, 4, 5, 9-2, 9-4, 9-5 codes.)
R-R' pattern in either of leads V1, V2 with R' amplitude more or equal to R

Complete right bundle branch block (RBBB). (Do not code in the presence of 6-1, 6-4-1, 6-8, 8-2-1 or 8-2-2.) QRS duration more or equal to 0.12 sec in a majority of beats in any of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF, plus: R' > R in V1 or V2; or QRS mainly upright, with R peak duration more or equal to 0.06 sec in V1 or V2; or S duration >R duration in all beats in lead I or II. (7-1 suppresses 1-2-3, 1-2-7, 1-2-8, 1-3-2, 1-3-6, all 2, 3, 4, 5, 9-2, 9-4, 9-5 codes

variable.name: ESMA55
variable.description: Misc (9x) 1x - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]
variable.value: Low QRS amplitude. QRS peak-to-peak amplitude < 5 mm in all beats in each of leads I, II, III, or < 10 mm in all beats in each of leads V1, V2, V3, V4, V5, V6. (Check calibration before coding.)

variable.name: ESMA56
variable.description: Misc (9x) 3x - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA57
variable.description: Misc (9x) 5x - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]
variable.value: T-wave amplitude > 12 mm in any of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF, V1, V2, V3, V4, V5, V6. (Do not code in the presence of 6-4-1, 7-1-1, 7-2-1 or 7-4.)

variable.name: ESMA58
variable.description: U wave (blank) - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA59
variable.description: Suppression 8 - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA60
variable.description: Technical problem (98x) - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA61
variable.description: Clear - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA62
variable.description: B2: suppression pat (6xx) - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA63
variable.description: C2: type of suppression (6xx) - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA64
variable.description: D2: bundle branch block - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA65
variable.description: E2: major Q I aVL V6 - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA66
variable.description: F2: minor Q I aVL V6 - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA67
variable.description: G2: major Q II III aVF - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA68
variable.description: H2: minor Q II III aVF - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA69
variable.description: I2: major Q V1-V5 - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA70
variable.description: J2: minor Q V1-V5 - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA71
variable.description: Visit or contact year - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA72
variable.description: Condition 1 - lead 1, ED1 [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA73
variable.description: Condition 1 - lead 2, ED1 [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA74
variable.description: Condition 1 - lead 3, ED1 [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA75
variable.description: Condition 2 - lead 1, ED1 [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA76
variable.description: Condition 2 - lead 2, ED1 [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA77
variable.description: Condition 2 - lead 3, ED1 [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA78
variable.description: Condition 3 - lead 1, ED2, 3, 4 [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA79
variable.description: Condition 3 - lead 2, ED2, 3, 4 [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA80
variable.description: Condition 3 - lead 3, ED2, 3, 4 [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA81
variable.description: Condition 4 - lead 1, ED5, 6, 7 [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA82
variable.description: Condition 4 - lead 2, ED5, 6, 7 [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA83
variable.description: Condition 4 - lead 3, ED5, 6, 7 [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA84
variable.description: Condition 5 - lead 1, EV 1-EV 8 [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA85
variable.description: Condition 5 - lead 2, EV 1-EV 8 [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA86
variable.description: Condition 5 - lead 3, EV 1-EV 8 [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA87
variable.description: Condition 7 - lead 1, ED2, 5, EV 1 [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA88
variable.description: Condition 7 - lead 2, ED2, 5, EV 1 [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA89
variable.description: Condition 7 - lead 3, ED2, 5, EV 1 [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA90
variable.description: Condition 8 - lead 1, EV 2 [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA91
variable.description: Condition 8 - lead 2, EV 2 [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA92
variable.description: Condition 8 - lead 3, EV 2 [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA93
variable.description: Condition 9 - lead 1, EV 1 [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA94
variable.description: Condition 9 - lead 2, EV 1 [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA95
variable.description: Condition 9 - lead 3, EV 1 [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA96
variable.description: Condition 10- lead 1, EV 2 [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA97
variable.description: Condition 10- lead 2, EV 2 [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA98
variable.description: Condition 10- lead 3, EV 2 [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA99
variable.description: Condition 11- lead 1, EV 6 [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA100
variable.description: Condition 11- lead 2, EV 6 [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA101
variable.description: Condition 11- lead 3, EV 6 [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA102
variable.description: Condition 12- lead 1, ED3, 6, EV 3 [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA103
variable.description: Condition 12- lead 2, ED3, 6, EV 3 [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA104
variable.description: Condition 12- lead 3, ED3, 6, EV 3 [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA105
variable.description: Condition 13- lead 1, EV 4 [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA106
variable.description: Condition 13- lead 2, EV 4 [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA107
variable.description: Condition 13- lead 3, EV 4 [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA108
variable.description: Condition 14- lead 1, EV 3 [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA109
variable.description: Condition 14- lead 2, EV 3 [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA110
variable.description: Condition 14- lead 3, EV 3 [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA111
variable.description: Condition 15- lead 1, EV 4 [ECG Serial Change, exam 2]

variable.name: ESMA112
